name: Studious
description: You have always been a studious student, able to pick up quickly on study material. However, you sacrificed your social skills in the process.

name: Diplomat
description: Growing up you’ve honed your people skills and groomed yourself well, but this has also put a burden on your mental health

name: Jock
description: From a young age you’ve always joined sports and got in really good shape in the process, but your academics skills have been neglected.
